column5: so there we are out for a small boat ride (and I tossed a frog a bit) and we hear the geese flying in and bang bang bang  I see one fall my kids were like what was that so I explaind someone was hunting .  when did duck or geese season start    really freaked me out
for geese it starts Sept 10th in southern Ont but for Parry sound area it opened on the 8th  geese only though
Yeah, Dove season will be opening down here in the next few day... sounds like World War 3!!!   .. need to kill all those Doves!!!.. they're such a viscious blood thirsty breed yanno!!!
Yep, goose opener today in southern Ontario. We got the young lads out for a shoot this morning. 4 man limit on the ground by 7:20am.   The boys had a blast!!
The dog is like..  "Hell yeah!!!  Look at all muh supper!!!!!!!"  Nice pic Sinker.
Nice shootin Sinker. I bet that dogs gut is full of feathers..
Awesome picture!  Dog got a serious work out right there!
Great photo. Keeping the sport alive.  Nice shooting there fellas.
why are the 4 rubberneckers behind the kids shoulder still standing LOL
Its always Goose season, sometimes you have to use a car as a gun! j/k  Looks like lots of fun! Never been though!
We should hire these boys at our golf course. Jim
We could be in and out before the first T off. No problem. Have gear, will travel   Very effective pest management  S.
There were over 10 dozen of them behind the camera man  We had to get a few in the picture
The lil' guy on the left sure is carryin' an awful big BB-gun!
